questions.question: This is substantial savings in work since the additional triangular solutions cost only _________
Sherman-Morrison formula gives inverse of matrix resulting from rank-one change to matrix whose inverse is already known.

answers.b: $$ (A - uv^T)^{-1} = A^{-1} + A^{-1}u(1 - v^TA^{-1}u)^{-1}v^TA^{-1} $$
answers.c: $$ (A - uv^T)^{-1} = A^{-1} + A^{-1}u(1 - v^TA^{-1}u)^{-1} $$
